paper.title: Financial Investment Recommendation in Coastal Areas Based on Improved Clustering Algorithm
paper.abstract: Based on the full analysis of the advantages and disadvantages of the traditional K - means and BIRCH clustering algorithms, an improved incremental clustering algorithm based on the core tree is proposed. The optimal global parameters Eps and MinPts are adaptively calculated according to the KNN distribution and mathematical statistics to avoid manual intervention in the clustering process so as to realize the full automation of the clustering process. By improving the seed selection method for regional query, no missing operation is needed to effectively improve the efficiency of clustering. The algorithm can helps financial users to make reasonable financial investment strategies in coastal areas, to a certain extent, reduce the financial investment risk, with strong practical significance.

domain_result.justification: 该论文提出了一种改进的聚类算法，旨在帮助金融用户在沿海地区制定合理的金融投资策略，并降低金融投资风险。这直接关联到投资组合管理领域，因为投资策略的制定和风险管理是投资组合管理的核心内容。
